text:
[Verse]
See the lightning flash
Feel the thunder clash
Puddles under feet
Hear the city beat

[Verse 2]
Splashin’ in the street
Groovin’ to the beat
Raindrops fallin’ down
Spinnin’ all around

[Chorus]
Dancin’ in the rain
Easin’ all the pain
Let the storm begin
Feel it on your skin

[Verse 3]
Moonlight in the mist
Catchin' every twist
Shadows start to play
Night turns into day

[Chorus]
Dancin’ in the rain
Easin’ all the pain
Let the storm begin
Feel it on your skin

[Bridge]
Through the darkest night
Everything’s alright
Just a little fun
Until the daylight comes
title: Dancing in the Rain
